description:
Spacious new artist loft apartment close to restaurants and bars. The building offers a luxury hotel like setting. You’ll love this apt because of the high ceilings, the coziness, the location, the people. Brand new unit with king sized bed, cozy mid century couch and modern decor. Amenities include: 2 part Event space, pool table, gym, courtyard & furnished rooftop access for beautiful Manhattan & Brooklyn views. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Great inspiring space in a new beautiful building. Spacious apartment with office area and king sized bed. Extremely quiet. Central air and heat. ipod dock for surround sound music. WiFi. Large screen TV. Rain showerhead and large bathtub. Neighborhood next to Williamsburg and easy access to Manhattan, G train Greenpoint stop 4 short blocks away. The couch does not pull out. A twin air mattress is also available for sleeping.

Access to gym, roof and event room.

G Train connects to the L train at Lorimer in Brooklyn or the E/M at Court Square in LIC.
name: Modern Loft Style Apt in trendy Brooklyn
review: L'appartement de Salvatore est vraiment agréable, très fidèle aux photos avec pleins d'équipements collectifs à disposition (terrasse sur le toit, salle de sport, billard, laverie) et vraiment bien situé. En 10 minutes à pied, on rejoint la ligne 7 pour Manhattan, super pratique. Et le quartier est parfait pour boire des verres et manger. Salvatore est disponible et à l'écoute.
